snippet: Lawmakers passed a bill Wednesday that would make North Carolina one of several states with 72-hour waiting periods for abortions.
abstract: North Carolina lawmakers pass bill requiring women to wait 72 hours before having abortion; Gov Pat McCrory is expected to sign bill despite 2012 campaign pledge not to sign any further restrictions on abortions.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers passed a bill Wednesday that would make North Carolina one of several states with 72-hour waiting periods for abortions.

headline.main: North Carolina: Legislature Votes to Extend Abortion Waiting Period
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Legislature Votes to Extend Abortion Waiting Period
